message:
The U.S. has deployed hard-hitting naval and air force units around the North African country and Britain has begun drawing up plans for a no-fly zone in a concerted effort to hasten the tyrant's downfall.

‎"Imposing a no-fly zone on Libya could lead to an all-out war, a senior U.S. military figure warned today... General James Mattis, commander of U.S. Central Command, said: ‘It would be a military operation – it wouldn’t be just telling people not to fly airplanes. You would have to remove air defence capability in order to establish a no-fly zone, so no illusions here.'"
